sys_hub_flow.name: Overdue NeedIt Task

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: get the property of needit records which tells how many days after the record closed itself.

sys_element_mapping.value: NeedIt Task {{070e3957-069c-46f4-9263-6e61cdc8a939.item.number}} was closed because it's due date {{070e3957-069c-46f4-9263-6e61cdc8a939.item.due_date}} was older than the autoCloseProperty.
